text: usee kee or tumasab ko lautana hai. ye allaah ka saty vachan hai. vahee utpatti ka aarambh karata hai. phir vahee punah utpann karega, taaki unhen nyaay ke saath pratiphal pradaan[1] kare. jo eemaan laaye aur sadaachaar kiye aur jo kaafir ho gaye, unake lie kholata pey tatha duhkhadaayee yaatana hai, us avishvaas ke badale, jo kar rahe the
